ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics

Class Pilot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics.Pilot

  • public final class Pilot
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class handles the physics and the position of the pilot.
    Author:
    Christian Brüesch / Jonas Gschwend
